ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Melt cheese on the skillet first, place ham and bread on top of the melted cheese
Cook until bread is golden and cheese has formed a crispy crust on the bottom
The Swiss cheese adds a subtle nuttiness that complements the ham nicely
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This technique differs from traditional grilled cheese. Are you ready to try the inside-out method, or would you prefer a classic approach?
